metadata.title: CVE-2019-18604 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
In axohelp.c before 1.3 in axohelp in axodraw2 before 2.1.1b, asdistributed in TeXLive and other collections, sprintf is mishandled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-18604` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libkpathsea6 - 2019.20190605.51237-3ubuntu0.2
libptexenc1 - 2019.20190605.51237-3ubuntu0.2
libsynctex2 - 2019.20190605.51237-3ubuntu0.2
libtexlua53 - 2019.20190605.51237-3ubuntu0.2
libtexluajit2 - 2019.20190605.51237-3ubuntu0.2
texlive-binaries - 2019.20190605.51237-3ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: texlive-bin package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2019.20190605.51237-3ubuntu0.2').
